RFC.description: A unique alphanumeric identifier assigned by Mexico’s tax authority (SAT) to individuals and businesses for tax and invoicing purposes.

Razon_social.description: Legal name of the company or individual

codigo_postal.description: Postal code of the user's address

colonia.description: Neighborhood or subdivision within the city

población.description: City or town where the user is located

uso_de_cfdi.description: Purpose of the invoice according to SAT (México)

delegacion_municipio.description: Municipality or borough of the user's address

estado.description: State where the user is located

regimen_fiscal.description: Fiscal regime under which the user is registered

store_name.description: Name of the store where the purchase was made

ticket_date.description: Date when the ticket was issued

ticket_total.description: Total amount of the purchase, excluding tips

billing_url.description: Primary Key - URL for accessing the invoice details
